Subject: Re: THE MINIONS OF UNICRON HAVE COME!

OOC: If I have forgotten anyone, I am truely sorry. Just alert me and I
will ajust as I can.

BIC:

The skies above Atlantis are positively littered with sweeps, like some
horrid mechanical insect plague, lasers and cannon fire almost buzzing
as they rip into the grounds below. As the new defenders arrive on the
scene the sweeps are only too happy to turn their firepower on the
approaching ships, even as the sweeps are tagged by shooters and cut
down by artillery fire. 

Towards the Maximal base: 

     Scourge watches the Maximal (Ravenchief) rocket out of the line of
fire unscathed yet again. He frowns, or he would if he had a true mouth
in this form. Suddenly his attention is taken by a form (Remus) that
streaks through the skies, flying through clouds of sweeps somehow
unmolested. �Hrm. We can�t be having that, now can we?� he muses to
himself. With a violent thrust of power he and the sweeps with him move
in pursuit!

Meanwhile around the Maximal Base:

     The two remaining sweeps are still at the maximal targeting the
shield, struggling to fulfill the last orders given them. Six charred
scorch marks on the ground and fragments of sweeps are mute testimony
to the defending skill of Guardia and the turrets. The sweeps are
nearly startled for a second as the frame of Ravenchief comes barreling
over the shield. They had been so busy plugging away at the shield, and
staying at the far side or out of the firing arc of the base defenders
that they had almost missed him. However they turn eager cannons on him
and open fire, happy at last to have something to fire upon instead of
a force field!


With the arriving defenders:

Jotunn�s attacks are effective, although gatling gun takes a few hits
on each one to penetrate their armor he is able to take down a few.
Elder is also effective in raking damaging hits on the sweeps and a few
of them also fall to the ground in explosive fireballs of destruction.
Even as they do this more sweeps are moving in to attack, lasers
burning through the air!

Grimlock attempts to ride a few sweeps to the ground and discovers that
sweeps do not make for willing surfboards. With an agile twist they
dump him, allowing him to plummet towards the unyielding ground! With
an amazing agility the sweeps turn and sweep back on their would be
rider opening up with disintegration cannons!

On the ground:

Peresus�s reprieve continues for the moment as the sweeps pull back,
distracted by the arrival of the defenders! However a figure runs out
of the darkness and runs towards the group of militia, �Wait! Wait!� it
yells, its voice definitely male. As he comes nearer the intermittent
light from laser fire shows him to be militia and heavily damaged. A
hand is gone part of his faceplate and his armor is burnt. He appears
to be coming from the far side of the city, from the area of the first
sweep attack. �They are taking them! You have to ... *Cough* � help ��
He stumbles �. �You have to stop them ��
 

At the water front:

Above Cyclonus sweeps continue to pour over the railing like water
moving to assist their commander in whatever he needs. But so far they
are just circling, waiting for the next command. 

Below Cyclonus is eying Rodimus Prime his hands held out in front of
him. It is then that a spray of bullets slams into him, causing him to
spin. But dancer smooth he quickly comes to a stop, quickly reorienting
on Rodimus below and the new attacker who has so foolishly positioned
himself in front of him. Cyclonus was about to respond when proximity
alarms went off as four missiles approached at great speed! Cyclonus
almost smiled.

If anyone thought Scourge was fast it is here that Cyclonus put him to
shame. Cyclonus, whether in jet mode or robot was made for the air �

Like a skater he swung behind Remus as the missiles approached only at
the last moment jetting to the side allowing him to take the brunt of
at least one of them. Quickly Cyclonus shot towards the cliff face
behind him and then to the side and up as another missile, not agile
enough to make the turn impacted it and exploded! The last two rose up
towards Cyclonus as he turned to face them. As they climbed the last
few meters to his position, Cyclonus opened up with a terrific burst of
power from his dual pulse cannons, converting the housing of both
missiles from armored metal into oxygen and simultaneously releasing
their power into the air! 

For a moment Cyclonus is surrounded by a terrific nimbus of energy as
smoke and fire occupy the position that he once flew �

     � and then quite suddenly it does not!

Cyclonus floats regally with both hands extended, fingers opened and
spread, the palms filled with what would appear to be black holes that
seem to leech the damage of the explosion, filling his systems with it.


There is a pause as Cyclonus dropped his hands to his sides as his
bleed-back receptors close and he seemed to almost breath the new
energy in.  

Above them and around the city the sweeps as a whole rise into the air
and swirl through the air, looking like a massive storm in the skies.
They swing and loop and yet for the moment not firing unless fired
upon. 

Cyclonus looked down at Rodimus Prime, his optics also now filled with
some strange new light as he floated in the air. �AGREED!�


Preston
(Da'minion)
